code: import React,{useRef}from'react';import{useScroll,animated}from'@react-spring/web';import'./CustomScrollBar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const X_LINES=40;const INITIAL_WIDTH=20;const CustomScrollBar=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const containerRef=useRef(null);const{scrollYProgress}=useScroll({container:containerRef});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{ref:containerRef,className:"scroll-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"animated-layers",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(animated.div,{className:"bar-container",children:Array.from({length:X_LINES}).map((_,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(animated.div,{className:"bar",style:{width:scrollYProgress.to(scrollP=>{const percentilePosition=(i+1)/X_LINES;return INITIAL_WIDTH/4+40*Math.cos((percentilePosition-scrollP)*Math.PI/1.5)**32;})}},i))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(animated.div,{className:"bar-container-inverted",children:Array.from({length:X_LINES}).map((_,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(animated.div,{className:"bar",style:{width:scrollYProgress.to(scrollP=>{const percentilePosition=1-(i+1)/X_LINES;return INITIAL_WIDTH/4+40*Math.cos((percentilePosition-scrollP)*Math.PI/1.5)**32;})}},i))})]}),children]});};export default CustomScrollBar;
